authorizations.description: Support for basic authentication can be enabled through Mautics Configuration -> API Settings.
authorizations.name: basic_auth

properties.description: Open your Mautic instance and copy the URL from the address bar. If your dashboard link is "https://mautic.ddev.site/s/dashboard", set your base URL as "https://mautic.ddev.site/".
properties.label: Base URL
properties.name: baseUrl

authorizations.title: Mautic Basic Auth

description: Simplifying campaign design and optimization with a user-friendly click-and-drag interface allowing you to build complex campaigns.
name: mautic
title: Mautic
